page.title: 13KILBURN(DERBY)AREA:SPORTS C.
page.content: Written by an 11_year_old child In the morning we split into groups to find out different things about the Sports Centre. The group I was in were finding out things about the Sports Hall and Gymnasium. I was very surprised at the size of the Sports Hall. It must have been the biggest place I have ever been in. I was surprised to find that the Sports Hall could have 400 people dancing in it but only 10 playing football. I also found out that it is quite possible to get a broken leg on the trampoline and if that isnt much to be surprised at I also found that the goal_posts are quite often vandalised. After that I had dinner and tried to hit a ball with a bat all afternoon (I think I missed it more times than I hit it).
